title: Healthcare AI Shifts Focus From Diagnosis to Workflow
description: The promise of artificial intelligence (AI) in healthcare has long centered on the vision of an autonomous diagnostic engine, a machine that sees disease where human eyes fail. Yet, the current reality in the banking, payments, and digital health ecosystem is…
